column4: My Edgy upgrade from 6.06 was interrupted and now fails to boot with "/etc/mdadm/mdadm.conf" no such file ore directory, can someone help ?
boot to the live cd and chroot your ubuntu install, from there continue the apt-get dist-upgrade
as long as you can get a command line it doesnt matter
even a gentoo live cd will do :) you just need a chroot environment
I tried previously via "recover broken system" although the upgrade continued, many things failed because /usr and /proc amongst others were not mounted
then the answer is simple.
Boot the live cd and we can go from there
you should register with nickserv so we can continue in /query as this is a littl ebusy
sorry what do you mean re nickserv
you are in irc, there is a "nickserve" on this irc network that you can register your nick (river) with and then you will be able to talk to be in a private chat
nickserv is a channel or a server , sorry bit of a noob
nickserv is a bot on this network
dont worry about it, just get back to doing what you were doing :P
yup
any live cd
thanks will go try now
np, just highlight me when your done
how did you get on?#
could not locate a live CD so downloading 6.10 now
how do I register with NickServe ?
I have the live CD, how do I boot to command prompt now ?
are you still on channel ?
